title: Video: Dad Rocks! – Mount Modern
content: When he’s talking to his friends, Dad Rocks! goes by the name of Snævar Njáll Albertsson, and he’s also likely to be found playing guitar, trumpet and singing in incredible Danish band Mimas, who sound something like Do Make Say Think would if they dropped all the austerity and starting smiling more. Snævar will be releasing his full length debut as Dad Rocks! on November 8th via Big Scary Monsters in the UK, Paper Garden Records in the US, and Kimi Records in Iceland. It’s called Mount Modern and the video for its opening title track can be found below. On the track, Albertsson couples the ghostly trumpet and innovative vocal lines Mimas devotees have come to know and love with intricate fingerpicking, delicate piano, and aching strings to create a beautiful teaser that has excited for the full length. And all set to a watercolour and ink stop-motion video with a wolf and a paper aeroplane in it, by Jollan Aurelio of Heister. Winner.
